DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy rest metabolic rate ( RMR ) use BodyGem BalanceLog help overweight obese individual manage weight .
DOC.detailed_description: The study plan develop test efficacy practical , structured , time-limited behavioral intervention ( HealtheLifestyle Program ) supplement standard HealtheTech product . Approximately 130 participant recruit randomize either HealtheTech Program ( focus calorie exercise goal use BalanceLog track ) , HealtheLifestyle Program ( use step counter , monthly email letter call provide information activity , nutrition , weight loss ) , delayed treatment program ( 3 month undergo intervention ) .
DOC.criteria: healthy adult men woman , 1860 year currently participate structure diet exercise program
